1.0.name: wordpress/contango
1.0.description: Contango is an elegant, simple and clean design, emphasis on content. This theme is powered with custom menu, custom background, custom header, sidebar widget, featured image, theme options, nice typography and built-in pagination features. Contango Theme is suitable for any business or personal website. The Theme can work for various different niches. Contango is translation-ready and so much more.
